text:
TO: Chuck Marquis
FROM: W. G. Harley
memorandum
October 21, 1968
Just for your information. Bob Hilliard called the other
day to say that the FCC has run across a unique situation
In the State of Alabama, which apparently has a law saying
that the only group or agency which can apply for an eduÂ¬
cational broadcasting station license in the State of Alabama
is the State ETV Commission. The FCC is checking this out
to be sure of the precise language and implications; it may
be subsequently raised as a matter of conflict between state
and federal law.
- WOH
00: Bob Mott
WSt/he
